context: I'm great I'm looking for something like The Sixth Sense (1999) , can you help?
How about The Happening (2008) ? Or have you seen Shutter Island (2010) ?
Yes I loved Shutter Island (2010) but haven't seen The Happening (2008)
resp: Along the lines of The Happening (2008) , there is also Signs (2002) directed by M. Night Shyamalan
